alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Teton, Fremont and northeastern Clark Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Spencer to 7 miles southwest of Gibson Meadows. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibility. Locations impacted include... Ashton, Idmon, Marysville, Henrys Lake, Spencer, Drummond, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Kilgore, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Ashton Reservoir, Warm River, Sheridan Reservoir, Humphrey, Harriman State Park, Monida Pass and Ashton Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Upper Snake River Plain
